Class Survivor

public class Survivor
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents a Survivor Office Pool

Author:
Connor Graham, Jonathan Di Nardo, Coby Viner

                          java.lang.String cID,

lastName - the last name of the new contestant

tribe - the tribe of the new contestant
